ingredients: 12 ounces vine-ripe tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 to 2 teaspoons hot sauce (or to taste), such as Tabasco
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
Garnish: pickled okra (talkotexas.com) and lemon wedges
